Text: Awesome! :D sharing knowledge has got to be the most noble thing ;) Thanks!

download speed for the is was excellent BUT I have now downloaded this torrent 3 times and CAN NOT BE PLAYED.  THE VIDEO DOES NOT WORK.  as far as i can tell something went wrong with the original encoding and the up loader did not test play them before he uploaded.

is anyone else having problems playing the vids? i am cybermurf@aol.com.  i think they were badly ripped because i cant even convert them to something else like .mov or .avi. 
i am dying to see these now. anyone have some feedback?
No idea what the problem is. They play back fine for me, both in VLC Media Player and in BS Player Pro. Perhaps you can try to download and install the K-Lite codec pack.

i have k-lite (it rocks).  i tried using quicktime (it doesn't rock) and it still didn't work.  guess i will try vlc or try downloading them from a different computer.   by the way.. thanks for the all the up loads you have quite a good list of things.

ok... i owe you an apology. i downloaded it to a different machine and it works fine. something must not have completed in the downloading on the other machine. i am truly sorry.  thanks for your help and thanks again for the great upoads
